section.title: SDL_atomic_t Struct Reference

para.para: A type representing an atomic integer value. It is a struct so people don't accidentally use numeric operations on it.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: A type representing an atomic integer value. It is a struct so people don't accidentally use numeric operations on it.
